Articles.Content:
Hello my name is Malicar from Lake Errock BC Canada. Just purchased the game a few days ago and have been hooked since. This is easily the indy GOTY for me. This is the game I didn't know I was waiting for. Thank you for early access on STEAM and a great site dedicated to mods and the community. I hope to see this game evolve into a classic that will be remembered for a long time to come.

I open the scuttle at night and see the far sprinkled systems, and all I see multiplied as high as I can cipher edge but the rim of the farther systems. Wider and wider they spread, expanding, always expanding, outward and outward and forever outward.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Why thank you. I'll be floating around in STEAM community chat while I play. Feel free to drop by and say hello everyone.

This is my first manned orbital rocket sitting on the launch pad at night. The Jyandos I - 2 Stage Orbital Rocket by Kerpal Industries

Edited April 21, 2013 by Malicar

Nice rocket Malicar, and welcome to the community

I understand what you mean about KSP being the game we didn't know we wanted, it just seems to hit all the right notes and doesn't get dull.

Don't forget to take a look round the forums, there's a lot going on here
